episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses- How we KNOW it's the Truth
episodes.description:
How Do Jehovah's Witnesses know they have the truth?

Well they have lots of ways to be sure, let's find out a few.

Please check out my hilarious book "The Great Apostate" and my less funny but very useful "How To Leave A Cult" on Amazon.

episodes.title: What Do Jehovah's Witnesses REALLY Think About You?
episodes.description:
If you want more information about the JW's, please visit jwfacts.com

Any person that is not a Jehovah's Witnesses is described by the Watchtower as a "worldly person" that is alienated from God and hence controlled by the devil. This is standard for high control groups, such as Exclusive Brethern, who discourage members from associating with "worldly" non-members. 

As you may know I now have written a short book called “How To Leave A Cult”. It’s available on Amazon and I hope it helps people who have left or want to leave the Jehovah’s Witnesses or any other cult.

NOW IN PAPERBACK!! https://www.amazon.com/dp/197359580X 

Kindle 
USA: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B078G8D27H 

UK https://www.amazon.co.uk/How-Leave-Cult-Jehovahs-Witnesses-ebook/dp/B078G8D27H/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1513694039&sr=8-1&keywords=how+to+leave+a+cult
